vclaim: U.S. representatives Marjorie Taylor-Greene and Lauren Boebert were the only lawmakers who voted against the Transplant Act of 2021, which reauthorizes the National Marrow Donor Program, a database that helps match donors and patients with serious blood diseases.
title: Were MTG, Lauren Boebert the Only Lawmakers Who Voted Against Marrow-Donor Bill?
subtitle: The Transplant Act would reauthorize the National Marrow Donor Program, a database of donors for people with fatal blood diseases.
author: Nur Ibrahim
